COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix podman --noout to suppress all output Podman --noout was not suppressing output from commands that do not create the podman engine. Now, podman --noout properly suppresses output from every command. Fixes: https://github.com/containers/podman/issues/16201 Signed-off-by: Ashley Cui <acui@redhat.com>
